howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.body: Our BBQ is handcrafted, made-to-order, and delivered with love. We operate on a custom, small-batch basis — just let us know what you're planning, and we’ll bring the fire.

story.title: Our Story
story.body: We’re a couple based in Houston, cooking BBQ that brings people together. What started as weekend cookouts turned into a word-of-mouth delivery business. Every plate comes from the heart — and goes straight to your door.
